name: SOUP (TradeChest)
description:
From now on, you are a little squid. And if you want to live - swim. Swim as fast as you can.

The evil chef threw you into the bubbling soup. The only way out is the edge of the pan in an unknown direction.

Too hot? Don't forget to take a sip of air in the bubbles. And yes, do not forget that you are not alone in the soup.

Can the little squid swim out of the soup? Depends only on you.
